mapper.select: select count(*) from member where username = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into member (username, password, name, tel, email, postcode, address1, address2, role, marketingYn) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{postcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{role}, #{marketingYn})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET name=#{name}, tel=#{tel}, email=#{email}, postcode=#{postcode}, address1=#{address1}, address2=#{address2}, marketingYn=#{marketingYn} WHERE username=#{username}
